items.sentence: The movie that Tom and I are planning to watch tonight is supposed to be really scary.
Brazil shares a border with all South American countries except for Chile and Ecuador.
Tom agreed to meet us in front of the movie theater tomorrow at 2:30 in the afternoon.
When Tom looked down at the apple he was eating, he realized he had eaten half a worm.
Tom regrets buying the car sight unseen, because it's broken down twice in two months.
